publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3881 Patricia Ferguson: Queens Cross Housing Association, An Investor in Peopleâ€”That the Parliament notes that Queens Cross Housing Association has been awarded Investor in People status; congratulates the management committee and staff on the hard work and commitment that has made this achievement possible, and wishes them well as they strive to continue to deliver the best possible service to tenants.
S3M-3881 Queens Cross Housing Association, An Investor in People (lodged on 6 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3881 Queens Cross Housing Association, An Investor in People (lodged on 6 April 2009) Sarah Boyack*
